affects:
ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc:
Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement. Lasts 1.5 seconds on Heroes, and 7 seconds on creeps.
Frost Arrows is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
notes: The slow duration is refreshed on successive casts.
attrib:
MOVEMENT SLOW: 15%/30%/45%/60%
HERO DURATION: 1.5
CREEP DURATION: 7
cmb:
12/12/12/12
0
lore: Ice-encased arrows pierce the silence, chilling their victims to the core.
name: drow_ranger_frost_arrows

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to you.
cmb:
90
13
lore: Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.
name: drow_ranger_wave_of_silence

desc: Adds bonus damage to the physical attack of allied, ranged Hero units on the map based on a percentage of Drow's agility.  Affects creeps for 30 seconds when cast.
cmb: 120
lore: Traxex' time spent alone in the forests of her Drow home has allowed her to teach other archers how to improve their bow skills.
name: drow_ranger_trueshot

desc: Drow's experiences in battle improve her accuracy and effectiveness in combat, providing a passive bonus to Agility. Grants no bonus if there are enemy heroes within 400 range.
lore: The Drow Ranger is the epitome of archery prowess.
name: drow_ranger_marksmanship
